name: BetaBox
0:
”Alexa, ask Beta Box to open the garage door”
”Alexa, ask Beta Box to close the garage door”
”Alexa, ask Beta Box to check the garage door”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beta box
des: Beta Box is a smart garage door controller, and when teamed with Alexa provides a very easy way of opening, closing and checking (querying the status of) up to two garage doors.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
